title: Cheap TV deal! This 75-inch 4K TV is on sale for just $629.99 at Best Buy
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score a massive $370 discount on this Hisense 4K smart TV
article: If you're in the market for a cheap TV deal, then you're in luck. Best Buy's 3-day sale is happening now and we've spotted this Hisense 75-inch 4K TV on sale for just $629.99 (was $999.99). That's a massive $370 discount and a fantastic price for a feature-packed big-screen 4K TV.

While this Hisense set might not be the best TV in the world, it does feature 4K HD resolution and DTS Virtual X technology for a cinema-like picture experience with bold, bright colors and an immersive audio experience. The big-screen TV also has smart capabilities, so you can enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows from apps like Netflix, Hulu, Disney Plus, and more. You're also getting a handy voice remote, and the Google Assistant built in so you can control your TV and compatible smart home devices completely hands-free. This is not only a fantastic deal for a 75-inch 4K TV but also the best price we've found for this particular model. Best Buy's 3-day sale ends on Sunday, so you'll have to take advantage of this epic bargain now before it's too late.
